sentences.en: A 40 watt bulb would be quite sufficient and would not obtrude.
sentences.cn: 40瓦的灯泡完全够亮了，并且不会晃眼。

sentences.en: A word to the wise is sufficient.
Although she had various boyfriends, Madeleine was, and remains, fiercely self-sufficient.
sentences.cn: 尽管有过各种各样的男朋友，马德琳过去和现在一直都非常自立。

sentences.en: Another flight would be arranged on Saturday if sufficient demand arose.
sentences.cn: 如果需求量足够大，周六将再安排一趟航班。

sentences.en: Cheap goods are available, but not in sufficient quantities to satisfy demand.
sentences.cn: 有一些廉价的商品，但是数量不足以满足需求。

sentences.en: Drunkenness at work was sufficient grounds for instant dismissal.
sentences.cn: 工作时醉酒足可导致立即被开除.

sentences.en: He says they mistakenly believed the standard licenses they held were sufficient.
sentences.cn: 他说他们曾经误以为有正规执照就足够了。

sentences.en: His income is sufficient for his needs.
sentences.cn: 他的收入能满足他的需要.

sentences.en: Our village has a grain reserve sufficient for three years.
sentences.cn: 我们村的储备粮够吃三年.

sentences.en: The aircraft bumped along erratically without gathering anything like sufficient speed.
sentences.cn: 飞机忽上忽下，飞行很不平稳，根本未达到应有的速度。

sentences.en: The money to build the power station ought to have been sufficient.
sentences.cn: 建设电站的资金本该足够了。

sentences.en: The pension is not sufficient for living expenses.
sentences.cn: 这年金不够应付生活费用.

sentences.en: The rain was not sufficient to do any harm.
These people have now become almost self - sufficient in grain crops.
sentences.cn: 这些人的粮食现在已经差不多能自给了.

sentences.en: Unauthorized absence is sufficient reason for dismissal.
sentences.cn: 旷工足以成为解雇的理由。

sentences.en: Using traditional methods poor farmers can be virtually self-sufficient.
sentences.cn: 采用传统的方法，贫穷的农民基本上能自给自足。

sentences.en: We can only prosecute if there is sufficient evidence.
sentences.cn: 有了足够的证据，我们才能提出起诉。

sentences.en: We need sufficient time to deal with the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们需要足够的时间来处理这个问题。

phrases.tran_cn: 充要条件；必要且充分的条件
自给自足的；极为自负的
充要条件；充分必要条件
不靠他人，不受他人影响

trans.tran_en: as much as is needed for a particular purpose
